trans-unit.source: Include a Service Bus Topic Destination
trans-unit.target: Include a Service Bus Topic Destination

trans-unit.source: Add a <token>sb2</token> topic as a destination to a <token>msgflow_proj</token>.
trans-unit.target: Add a <token>sb2</token> topic as a destination to a <token>msgflow_proj</token>.

trans-unit.source: In a <token>msgflow_proj</token>, you can represent <token>sb2</token> topic destinations that have still not been created.
trans-unit.target: In a <token>msgflow_proj</token>, you can represent <token>sb2</token> topic destinations that have still not been created.

trans-unit.source: However, representing a non-existent <token>sb2</token> topic on a <token>msgflow_proj</token> designer surface does not create the topic.
trans-unit.target: However, representing a non-existent <token>sb2</token> topic on a <token>msgflow_proj</token> designer surface does not create the topic.

trans-unit.source: To add a <token>sb2</token> topic to a <token>msgflow_proj</token>
trans-unit.target: To add a <token>sb2</token> topic to a <token>msgflow_proj</token>

trans-unit.source: Create a <token>msgflow_proj</token>, as described in <link xlink:href="03421690-817a-45a8-8492-c9cb98484102" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to Create a Message Flow Project</link>.
trans-unit.target: Create a <token>msgflow_proj</token>, as described in <link xlink:href="03421690-817a-45a8-8492-c9cb98484102" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to Create a Message Flow Project</link>.

trans-unit.source: Right-click anywhere on the <token>msgflow_proj</token> design area, select <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Right-click anywhere on the <token>msgflow_proj</token> design area, select <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: For the <embeddedLabel>BizTalk Service URL</embeddedLabel> property, enter your <token>af_integration</token> URL.
trans-unit.target: For the <embeddedLabel>BizTalk Service URL</embeddedLabel> property, enter your <token>af_integration</token> URL.

trans-unit.source: From the <embeddedLabel>Toolbox</embeddedLabel>, drag and drop the <embeddedLabel><token>sb2</token> Topic Destination</embeddedLabel> component to the <token>msgflow_proj</token> design area.
trans-unit.target: From the <embeddedLabel>Toolbox</embeddedLabel>, drag and drop the <embeddedLabel><token>sb2</token> Topic Destination</embeddedLabel> component to the <token>msgflow_proj</token> design area.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the <token>sb2</token> Topic component, and then select <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the <token>sb2</token> Topic component, and then select <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Enter the following properties:
trans-unit.target: Enter the following properties:

trans-unit.source: Property Name
trans-unit.target: Property Name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Associated Project Item
trans-unit.target: Associated Project Item

trans-unit.source: This is a read-only field and provides the name of the associated .config file.
trans-unit.target: This is a read-only field and provides the name of the associated .config file.

trans-unit.source: If you change the name of the component on the <token>msgflow_proj</token> design area by changing the <embeddedLabel>Entity Name</embeddedLabel> property, the name of the .config file also changes.
trans-unit.target: If you change the name of the component on the <token>msgflow_proj</token> design area by changing the <embeddedLabel>Entity Name</embeddedLabel> property, the name of the .config file also changes.

trans-unit.source: Authentication
trans-unit.target: Authentication

trans-unit.source: Specify how you want to authenticate with the <token>sb2</token> Topic.
trans-unit.target: Specify how you want to authenticate with the <token>sb2</token> Topic.

trans-unit.source: Select the ellipsis <embeddedLabel>(…)</embeddedLabel> against the <embeddedLabel>Authentication</embeddedLabel> property and the select a value from the <embeddedLabel>Token Provider</embeddedLabel> drop-down.
trans-unit.target: Select the ellipsis <embeddedLabel>(…)</embeddedLabel> against the <embeddedLabel>Authentication</embeddedLabel> property and the select a value from the <embeddedLabel>Token Provider</embeddedLabel> drop-down.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Shared Secret</embeddedLabel>, and then provide the issuer name and issuer key.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Shared Secret</embeddedLabel>, and then provide the issuer name and issuer key.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Shared Access Signature</embeddedLabel> (SAS), and then provide the key name and key value associated with the SAS.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Shared Access Signature</embeddedLabel> (SAS), and then provide the key name and key value associated with the SAS.

trans-unit.source: Endpoint Configuration Name
trans-unit.target: Endpoint Configuration Name

trans-unit.source: Name of the client endpoint configuration in the .config file that defines which encoding to use.
trans-unit.target: Name of the client endpoint configuration in the .config file that defines which encoding to use.

trans-unit.source: The available options are <embeddedLabel>TextEncodedMessageBody</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>BinaryEncodedSoapEnvelope</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: The available options are <embeddedLabel>TextEncodedMessageBody</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>BinaryEncodedSoapEnvelope</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Use <embeddedLabel>TextEncodedMessageBody</embeddedLabel> when the receiver is a thick client or REST-based.
trans-unit.target: Use <embeddedLabel>TextEncodedMessageBody</embeddedLabel> when the receiver is a thick client or REST-based.

trans-unit.source: Use <embeddedLabel>BinaryEncodedSoapEnvelope</embeddedLabel> if the receiver is a WCF service.
trans-unit.target: Use <embeddedLabel>BinaryEncodedSoapEnvelope</embeddedLabel> if the receiver is a WCF service.

trans-unit.source: Entity Name
trans-unit.target: Entity Name

trans-unit.source: The name of the Topic component on the <token>msgflow_proj</token> design area.
trans-unit.target: The name of the Topic component on the <token>msgflow_proj</token> design area.

trans-unit.source: This name should be unique for a <token>msgflow_proj</token>.
trans-unit.target: This name should be unique for a <token>msgflow_proj</token>.

trans-unit.source: The entity name for a <token>sb2</token> Topic must only contain alphanumeric characters.
trans-unit.target: The entity name for a <token>sb2</token> Topic must only contain alphanumeric characters.

trans-unit.source: Runtime Address
trans-unit.target: Runtime Address

trans-unit.source: The public runtime endpoint URL where the <token>sb2</token> Topic is deployed.
trans-unit.target: The public runtime endpoint URL where the <token>sb2</token> Topic is deployed.

trans-unit.source: Update this field to include your <token>sb2</token> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Update this field to include your <token>sb2</token> namespace.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Save</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Save</embeddedLabel>.
